mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_fat_judg_stnd.select */ SELECT fat_judg_cd /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,bmi_fr /* bmi_fr BMI_FROM numeric */ ,bmi_to /* bmi_to BMI_TO numeric */ ,fidx_fr /* fidx_fr 비만지수_FROM numeric */ ,fidx_to /* fidx_to 비만지수_TO numeric */ ,curr_eval_cntn /* curr_eval_cntn 현재_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */ ,prdt_eval_cntn /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_fat_judg_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND fat_judg_cd = #{fatJudgCd} /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
